name: Cave cave
description:
Este cuento digital fue creado en una semana para el concurso de Cuento Digital de la fundación Itaú. Llegué a estar entre los finalistas (50 de 2000) pero no gané ningún premio. El cuento está creado con Godot engine y todo el contenido hecho por mi.

This digital short story was created in a week for the contest of Diigital short story from the Itaú fundation (Argentina, Paraguay and Uruguay). I was between the finalists (50 out of 2000) but didn't win. This short stoty was created with Godot engine and all its content was made by me. Unfortunately it's only available in Spanish yet.
